MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Barrhead, affecting properties in Gladstone Avenue and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.54am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Gladstone Avenue substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.24pm on Tuesday 2nd March 2021
